quotes: During his tenure as chairman of the Special Committee on Decolonization, Salim brought the world’s attention to injustices in Africa

quotes: his involvement with the NAM and the establishment of the NIEO during this period were indications of his commitment not just to political autonomy, but also to economic freedom and social justice.

quotes: Senior US administration officials in the National Security Council doubted that the situation in southern Africa [would] change.
the United States [could] simply continue to talk in terms of sharing the need for changes and their abhorrence of the policy of apartheid.

roles.title: chairman of the Special Committee on Decolonization
quotes: During his tenure as chairman of the Special Committee on Decolonization, Salim brought the world’s attention to injustices in Africa
Salim’s contributions to Africa, and especially to the abolition of apartheid, must be acknowledged.
Above all, it is for the people of South Africa themselves to pass judgement on the repercussion of this action and they have spoken in very forceful terms.
Senior US administration officials in the National Security Council doubted that the situation in southern Africa [would] change.
They believed that Rhodesia would continue to be run by Smith or people like him
Mozambique and Angola would continue to be run by the Portuguese
Mozambique and Angola would continue to be run by the Portuguese
Namibia would continue to be occupied by the South African apartheid regime
